snippet.title: DREAMO (PC) | First-Person Puzzle Adventure | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on a journey under the guidance of Doctor Tara Moreau and explore the dreamscapes of your subconscious to recover your memories. Memories are locked within Artifacts — three-dimensional puzzles that you must solve to wake up. Why are you dreaming? What secrets are concealed within your mind, and what is your guide hiding? What choices led you here? Every puzzle you solve leads to another. Slot the gears into their correct places, and hope that the last mechanism will unlock the exit...

Coming Q1 2020.

Add DREAMO to wishlist now!
PC version: tiny.cc/DREAMO
VR version: tiny.cc/DREAMOVR

Copyright Carbon Studio S.A. All rights reserved.
